anya-e0105n17:1_0: Punapi rājā dakkhiṇārāmavāsimhi jimhamānase kuhakatissatthere pasanno hutvā tassatthāya mahāvihārasīmabbhantare jotivanuyyāne jetavanavihāraṁ kāretumārabhi.
anya-e0105n17:1_1: Mahāvihāravāsino bhikkhū taṁ nivāretuṁ asakkontā punapi tato apakkamiṁsu.
anya-e0105n17:1_2: Tadāpi mahāvihāro nava māsāni bhikkhūhi suñño ahosi.
anya-e0105n17:1_3: Rājā pana attano ajjhāsayavaseneva tattha jetavanavihāraṁ kāretvā tassa kuhakatissattherassa adāsiyeva.
anya-e0105n17:1_4: Tattha dakkhiṇagirivihārato sāgaliyā bhikkhū āgantvā vasiṁsu.
anya-e0105n17:1_5: Pacchā ca te ambasāmaṇerasilākālarañño kāle (1067-1080-bu-va) vetullavādino ahesuṁ mahāvaṁse 37, 32-gāthādīsu, nikāyasaṅgahe 15-piṭṭhe.
anya-e0105n17:2_0: Evaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa sīhaḷadīpamāgamanakālato (965-bu-va) pubbeyeva visuddhattheravādīhi mahāvihāravāsīhi viruddhasamayā abhayagirivāsino (455-bu-va) sāgaliyā (797-810-bu-va) jetavanavāsino (829-845-bu-va) cāti tayo nikāyā uppannā ahesuṁ.
anya-e0105n17:2_1: Tesu pana abhayagirivāsinoyeva visesato pākaṭā ceva honti balavanto ca.
anya-e0105n17:2_2: Tathā hi te visuddhattheravādapiṭakañca vajjiputtakapariyāpannadhammarucinikāyapiṭakañca mahisāsakādinikāyapiṭakañca mahāyānapiṭakañca sampaṭicchanti.
anya-e0105n17:2_4: Mahisāsakādinikāyapiṭakassa sampaṭicchitabhāvo pana phāhiyannāmassa cinabhikkhuno addhānakkamasallakkhaṇakathāya ceva aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittavaṇṇapiṭakādināmavasena ca veditabbo,
